name: temu-trends
description: Collect Pinterest/TikTok/IG trends and map to Temu products. Builds static site.

scripts.trends: node scripts/collect_trends.js && node scripts/aggregate_trends.js && node scripts/score_trends.js && node scripts/merge_trends.js
scripts.seasonal: node scripts/collect_seasonal.js && node scripts/aggregate_trends.js && node scripts/score_trends.js && node scripts/merge_trends.js
scripts.regional: node scripts/collect_trends_regions.js && node scripts/aggregate_trends.js && node scripts/score_trends.js && node scripts/merge_trends.js
scripts.build:site: npm run build:pages && npm run build:landing

author: TANYLEE
